metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part I/Item 1A - Risk Factors/Legal and Regulatory Risks/
aws::graph::propositions: # Amazon Tax Expense and Liability Factors
Amazon's tax expense and liabilities are affected by changes in business operations.
Amazon's tax expense and liabilities are affected by acquisitions.
Amazon's tax expense and liabilities are affected by investments.
Amazon's tax expense and liabilities are affected by entry into new businesses.
Amazon's tax expense and liabilities are affected by entry into new geographies.
Amazon's tax expense and liabilities are affected by intercompany transactions.
Amazon's tax expense and liabilities are affected by the relative amount of Amazon's foreign earnings.
Amazon's tax expense and liabilities are affected by losses incurred in jurisdictions for which Amazon is not able to realize related tax benefits.
Amazon's tax expense and liabilities are affected by the applicability of special tax regimes.
Amazon's tax expense and liabilities are affected by the applicability of extraterritorial tax regimes.
Amazon's tax expense and liabilities are affected by changes in foreign exchange rates.
Amazon's tax expense and liabilities are affected by changes in Amazon's stock price.
Amazon's tax expense and liabilities are affected by changes to Amazon's forecasts of income and loss.
Amazon's tax expense and liabilities are affected by the mix of jurisdictions to which Amazon's income and loss relate.
Amazon's tax expense and liabilities are affected by changes in Amazon's tax assets and liabilities and their valuation.
In the ordinary course of Amazon's business, there are many transactions and calculations for which the ultimate tax determination is uncertain.
Significant judgment is required in evaluating and estimating Amazon's tax expense, assets, and liabilities.
In some cases Amazon may not have sufficient notice to enable Amazon to build systems and adopt processes to properly comply with new reporting obligations by the effective date.
In some cases Amazon may not have sufficient notice to enable Amazon to build systems and adopt processes to properly comply with new collection obligations by the effective date.

metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part I/Item 1A - Risk Factors/Legal and Regulatory Risks/
/FORM 10-K/Part I/Item 1A - Risk Factors/Legal and Regulatory Risks/

text:
In some cases we also may not have sufficient notice to enable us to build systems and adopt processes to properly comply with new reporting or collection obligations by the effective date.

Our tax expense and liabilities are also affected by other factors, such as changes in our business operations, acquisitions, investments, entry into new businesses and geographies, intercompany transactions, the relative amount of our foreign earnings, losses incurred in jurisdictions for which we are not able to realize related tax benefits, the applicability of special or extraterritorial tax regimes, changes in foreign exchange rates, changes in our stock price, changes to our forecasts of income and loss and the mix of jurisdictions to which they relate, and changes in our tax assets and liabilities and their valuation. In the ordinary course of our business, there are many transactions and calculations for which the ultimate tax determination is uncertain. Significant judgment is required in evaluating and estimating our tax expense, assets, and liabilities.
